sentences.sContent: Cost control of the project is that the cost management starts from the construction tender price until the completion of the project, throughout the total implementation of the project.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cost control of the project is that the cost management starts from the construction tender price until the completion of the project, throughout the total implementation of the project.
sentences.sCn: 工程项目的成本控制指的是施工成本管理应从工程投标标价开始，直至项目竣工结算完成为止，贯穿项目实施的总工程。

synos.tran: 温柔的；柔软的；脆弱的；幼稚的；难对付的
提供，偿还；使…变嫩；是…变柔软

phrases.pCn: 亲切照料；细心看护；（英）（对病入膏肓的老年患者停止积极治疗的）安乐护理

remMethod.val: tend(照料) + er → 婴儿太脆弱了， 需悉心照料 → 脆弱的

words.tran: 亲切；柔软；柔和；敏感；棘手

trans.tranOther: to make a formal offer to do a job or provide goods or services for a particular price

trans.tranCn: 嫩的；脆弱的；疼痛的，一触即痛的；温柔的
trans.tranOther: tender food is easy to cut and eat, especially because it has been well cooked
a formal statement of the price you would charge for doing a job or providing goods or services
to formally offer or show something to someone
